list.abs: The atmosphere may freeze around aphelion , but the composition is unknown , so we can ' t tell ., 这里的气氛可能会冻结远日点左右 , 但组成是未知的 , 所以我们无法知道.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: alteration of modern Latin aphelium (by substitution of the Greek inflection -on), from Greek aph' hēlion 'from the sun'

encyclopedia.content: 太阳系中的行星、小行星、彗星都是绕日旋转的，这些天体在运行轨道上距离太阳最远的那一点就叫做远日点。

means.word_mean: 1. apoapsis in solar orbit; the point in the orbit of a planet or comet that is at the greatest distance from the sun
